Darkfate::

Darkfate frowned and used his com link "Blacknightmare... Go to 
Predacon's council base and find out what is happening"

"Yes sir" answered the femme.

Darkfate used his comm link again "Drillbit, do you copy?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Youp, that fan fic is nothing more then wishful pro Hot Rod
> propaganda.
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He heard a rumble in the distance, then small explosians. It didn't 
take
> long to figure out what had happaned. His and Killfests base had 
been
> destroyed. But by who? And how?
> "Killfest, the base...!"
> 
> ::Dollen::
> 
> He was in a CR chamber when the base began to vaporize to nothing.
> With the system down, he made his escape. In the end he was cought 
under
> whatever ruble wasn't destroyed. Shrapnel was sticking through his 
body,
> and he was dieing.... again!
